item.description:
9:00am-1:00pm

Large yard sale- Lots of children's and baby equipment, clothes & toys as well as general yard sale items. No early birds please.

Join us to shop! Note: To sell items at this event, you must be a member of the Framingham-Area chapter of Mothers & More. Our Meetup.com listing is for publicity and communication purposes only. To become a member of the Framingham Area chapter of Mothers & More, you must either mail in an official membership form with your dues, or fill out the enrollment form online and pay via credit card at http://www.mothersand.... Please contact Asst. Organizer, Kate to have memberships forms and more chapter information mailed to you. Thanks!

Raindate: Saturday, June 13th
item.name: Mothers & More Yard Sale!
